enemies.name: Animated Armor 1
enemies.immunities: Poison, Psychic; Blinded, Charmed, Deafened, Exhaustion, Frightened, Paralyzed, Petrified, Poisoned

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.description: Incapacitated in antimagic field. Targeted by dispel magic: DC equals 10 + spell level CON save or Unconscious 1 min.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: While motionless, indistinguishable from normal armor.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) Bludgeoning damage.
